data.name: VR Skater
data.detailed_description:
A SKATEBOARDING GAME DESIGNED FROM THE GROUND UP FOR VR.

VR Skater is a highly immersive street skateboarding game. It's a finely tuned mix between arcade and simulation. It's easy to learn, but hard to master.
Skate through a wide variety of urban environments. Shred through the streets, take on challenges or chase high scores with complex trick combinations.

The game is in an early stage of development. See the Early Access description for more information.

VIVE Cosmos Controllers are currently not officially supported

Windows Mixed Reality Gen 1: It's playable, but we don't recommend it.

FEATURES (Early Access)

  • Detailed environments with high resolution textures
  • 4 fully designed and fully featured maps + 2 Tutorial Maps
  • Unique skateboarding controls designed for VR motion controllers
  • A wide range of street skateboarding tricks
  • A Skate Academy to learn all the tricks and complete challenges
  • Take to the streets with free practice for fun or chase scores in a run
  • Compete with others on the leaderboards
  • Listen to a rousing soundtrack of skateboarding-related genres from emerging artists (5 tracks in version 0.1)
  • Break your bones virtually so you don't have to in real life
  • Bugs

ON THE ROADMAP

  • Tour mode (main game mode)
  • Level challenges (tour mode)
  • Statistics
  • Achievements
  • Skateboard customizations
  • Many unique maps
  • More than 15 handpicked songs
  • Constant optimization

data.short_description: A skateboarding game designed from the ground up for VR.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4690 or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 or AMD RX Vega 56
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains music with lyrics that may contain adult themes using offensive language.
